text: The Muslim United Liberation Tigers of Assam (MULTA) is an Islamist extremist organization founded around 1996 in the Northeast Indian state of Assam. MULTA wants Muslims to be represented is the state legislature. It has about 1,000 members who have declared a jihad against the Indian Government. ==References== Category:Islam in India Category:Islamic terrorism Category:Islamic organizations Category:Organizations based in Assam
title: Muslim United Liberation Tigers of Assam
